SEARCH
Package controller

Class RegistrationController

java.lang.Object
controller.RegistrationController
All Implemented Interfaces:
IRegistrationService
public class RegistrationController extends Object implements IRegistrationService
Controller class for managing officer registrations to BTO Projects This class handles the creation, deletion and management of Registrations
